{{cpp/ranges/join_view/title|''sentinel''}}
{{cpp/ranges/join_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++20|notes={{mark expos}}|
template&lt; bool Const &gt;
class /*sentinel*/
}}

The return type of {{rlpt|end|join_view::end}} when either of the underlying ranges ({{tt|V}} or {{c|ranges::range_reference_t&lt;V&gt;}}) is not a {{lconcept|common_range}}, or when the parent {{tt|join_view}} is not a {{lconcept|forward_range}}.

If {{tt|V}} is not a [[cpp/ranges#Helper concepts|simple view]], {{tt|Const}} is {{c|true}} for sentinels returned from the const overloads, and {{c|false}} otherwise. If {{tt|V}} is a simple view, {{tt|Const}} is {{c|true}}.
